name: Football
description: Football is a game of love and emotion. It is the greatest show on earth. It helps improve a person's physical ability.

name: Cricket
description: Cricket is a game of gentleman. It can be played with a bat, a ball, a pitch and contains 22 of cricket player.

name: Tennis
description: A lovely sport is tennis. Tennis has basically 2 versions. One is ground tennis another one is table tennis. But the ground tennis has more fan and followers.

name: Basketball
description: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court.

name: Hockey
description: The word hockey is often preceded by another word i.e. field hockey, ice hockey, roller hockey, rink hockey, or floor hockey

name: Golf
description: Golf is a game played with a club and a ball that has further than 450 million suckers worldwide. It was constructed in Scotland in the 15th century.
